description: ff. 110. 323 x 250; 229 x 190 mm. 26 lin. 16th cen. anon. - according to colophon, the commentator completed his work in Rabīʻ II, 754. vol. 3: Kitāb al-ādāb - end. Incip.: ... کتاب الاداب ... وفىه مسائل الاولى فى بىان الحدىث هذا حدىث صحىح متفق على صحته رواه ابو هرىره
title: Sharḥ Mishkāt al-Maṣābīḥ.
subject: Baghawī, al-ḥusayn ibn Masʻūd, d. 1117?—Maṣābīḥ al-sunnah
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
